options.label: Create Deal
options.description: Creates a new deal record in HubSpot. Requires properties like deal name and amount, and optionally the pipeline.

options.label: Update Deal
options.description: Updates specific properties of an existing deal record in HubSpot using its unique Deal ID.

options.label: Get Deal
options.description: Retrieves the details of a specific deal record from HubSpot using its unique Deal ID.

options.label: List Deals
options.description: Retrieves a list of all deal records in your HubSpot account. Supports pagination to handle large numbers of deals.

options.label: Delete Deal
options.description: Permanently removes a specific deal record from HubSpot using its unique Deal ID.
